org.cougaar.planning.ldm
Class PlanningDomain

java.lang.Object
  org.cougaar.util.GenericStateModelAdapter
      org.cougaar.core.domain.DomainAdapter
          org.cougaar.planning.ldm.PlanningDomain
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component, Domain, GenericStateModel
public class PlanningDomain
extends DomainAdapter

This is the "planning" domain, which defines planning data types (Task, PlanElement, etc) and loads related LPs.
